trans-unit.source: Configures the ASP.NET event rules.
This class cannot be inherited.
Event rules determine which event, using which profile, is fired to which provider.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> class using default settings; however, the name, event name, and provider are specified.
The following table shows the default settings that are used for this constructor.

|Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.Custom%2A>|An empty string ("").| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.MaxLimit%2A>|<xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.MinInstances%2A>|1.| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.MinInterval%2A>|0 ticks.| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.Profile%2A>|An empty string ("").|
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> object to create.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> class where all values except those of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.Custom*> class are specified.
The following table shows the default settings that are used for this constructor.
|Property|Default value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings.Custom%2A>|An empty string ("").|
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> object to create.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event that can occur before the event is raised to the provider.
The maximum number of times events of the same type can be raised.
The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.BufferModeSettings"></xref> class where all values are specified.
You must provide every setting for this constructor.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> object to create.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
The minimum number of occurrences of an event of the same type before the event is fired to the provider.
The maximum number of times events of the same type are fired.
The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The fully qualified type of a custom class that implements <xref href="System.Web.Management.IWebEventCustomEvaluator"></xref>.
Gets or sets the fully qualified type of a custom class that implements <xref href="System.Web.Management.IWebEventCustomEvaluator"></xref>.
The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z].
For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"
The fully qualified type of a custom class that implements <xref href="System.Web.Management.IWebEventCustomEvaluator"></xref>.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings> object referenced by this property must be contained by the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection> object that also contains this <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings> object.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.EventMappingSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
This property must have a value greater than zero.
Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved.
This represents the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised.
For example, if the value is `10`, then the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter.
The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default value is <xref:System.Int32>.
Gets or sets the minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.
This property must have a value greater than zero.
Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved.
This represents the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider.
For example, if the return value is `5`, then ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs.
The minimum number of occurrences of the same type of event before the event is raised to the provider.
The default value is 1.
Gets or sets the minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The value can be made infinite by setting it to <xref:System.Int32.MaxValue>.
Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved.
If the value is zero, then there is no minimum interval.
The minimum time interval between two events of the same type.
The default value is 0 ticks.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> object.
A unique name is required.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings"></xref> object.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSettings> object referenced by this property must be contained by the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection> object that also contains this <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings> object.
The name of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
To be added.
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.

The <xref:System.Configuration.ProviderSettings> object referenced by this property must be contained by the same <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection> object that also contains this <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RuleSettings> object.
The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProviderSettings"></xref> object this rule applies to.
